product_name: Amphipod Hydraform Ergo-Lite Ultra Handheld Water Bottle - 16 fl. oz.
long_description: With a deluxe fit and feel, the insulated Hydraform Ergo-Lite Ultra Handheld Water Bottle holds 16 fl. oz. of water and has a expandable pocket for your smartphone, food and other essentials.
short_description: With a deluxe fit and feel, the insulated Hydraform Ergo-Lite Ultra Handheld Water Bottle holds 16 fl. oz. of water and has a expandable pocket for your smartphone, food and other essentials.
